revised_title: A Comprehensive Study of Viper Venom and Antidotes
tldr: This article discusses the effects of viper venom on the human body, its symptoms, and various antidotes and treatments. It also highlights the work of Pontaeus, an apothecary who developed an antidote for viper bites and claimed to have a remedy for the plague. The author shares his observations and experiences with viper venom, as well as other poisonous substances and their treatments.
